body_html: I changed my mind, after accidentally writing log_sigmoid(x) = -tf.nn.softplus(x) instead of the correct -tf.nn.softplus(-x). We should have tf.log_sigmoid, though it should be implemented as pure Python.
body_text: I changed my mind, after accidentally writing log_sigmoid(x) = -tf.nn.softplus(x) instead of the correct -tf.nn.softplus(-x).  We should have tf.log_sigmoid, though it should be implemented as pure Python.
body: I changed my mind, after accidentally writing `log_sigmoid(x) = -tf.nn.softplus(x)` instead of the correct `-tf.nn.softplus(-x)`.  We should have `tf.log_sigmoid`, though it should be implemented as pure Python.
